name: Life of Frog
description:
You are a tadpole that needs to find food in order to grow. In stage 1 you need to get 5 pieces of algae. In stage 2 you'll need 5 water bugs. That's how you win the game. Also watch out for the fish hiding in the algae!  Its very short and simple.

Controls:

Enter/Space - Starts the game

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Music used:
    Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

    Nautilus, Poinl https://opengameart.org/users/poinl
